topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/543af68e63687223d5000100#post_543af68e63687223d5000100
Honestly I think letsplayers and walkthrough people are a metaphorical bubble waiting to happen.  What I mean by this is remember how a couple years ago there were webcomics all over the fucking place and then when there was a oversaturation it popped and now everyone makes fun of them?  My money is on a year or two from now people get sick of all the generic letsplayers and only a fraction survive.
